publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4363.2 John Swinburne: Council Tax and Pensioner Povertyâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-4363) in the name of Mr John Swinney, insert at end "and further believes that, until such time as the council tax is replaced by a local income tax, pensioners in receipt of council tax benefit should be exempted from paying water and sewerage rates." Supported by: Margo MacDonald*
